articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Cricket: Australia likely to be unchanged for third test, says Paine
articles.description: Australia are unlikely to play a second spinner in the third test against New Zealand and will probably field the same team that beat the tourists in Melbourne last week to seal the series, captain Tim Paine said on Thursday.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Australia are unlikely to play a second spinner in the third test against New Zealand and will probably field the same team that beat the tourists in Melbourne last week to seal the series, captain Tim Paine said on Thursday.

articles.author: Aradhana Aravindan
articles.title: Singapore posts decade-low growth as trade war bruises output
articles.description: Singapore's economy expanded at its slowest pace in a decade last year as its manufacturing sector contracted, preliminary data showed on Thursday, though fourth quarter data firmed expectations for a modest recovery in 2020.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Singapore’s economy expanded at its slowest pace in a decade last year as its manufacturing sector contracted, preliminary data showed on Thursday, though fourth quarter data firmed expectations for a modest recovery in 2020.

articles.title: Taiwan top military official missing after helicopter made emergency landing
articles.description: Taiwan's top military official is missing after a helicopter made an emergency landing in northern Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Thursday.
articles.content:
TAIPEI (Reuters) - Taiwan’s top military official is missing after a helicopter made an emergency landing in northern Taiwan, the island’s defence ministry said on Thursday.

articles.author: Jessica Damiana
articles.title: Flood death toll rises to 21 in Indonesian capital
articles.description: The death toll from flash floods and landslides in and around Indonesia's capital Jakarta reached at least 21 on Monday, with more heavy rain forecast, authorities said.
articles.content:
JAKARTA (Reuters) - The death toll from flash floods and landslides in and around Indonesia’s capital Jakarta reached at least 21 on Monday, with more heavy rain forecast, authorities said.

articles.title: Gaming firm Razer joins Singapore digital bank race
articles.description: Gaming firm Razer Inc said on Thursday it is leading a consortium of companies that has applied for a online bank license in Singapore, joining the race to shake up the city state's financial sector.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Former NBA Commissioner Stern dies at 77
articles.description: Former National Basketball Association (NBA) Commissioner David Stern, who oversaw the explosive growth in the popularity of the game during his tenure, has died at the age of 77, the league said on Wednesday. Chris Dignam has more.
articles.content:
Posted 
Former National Basketball Association (NBA) Commissioner David Stern, who oversaw the explosive growth in the popularity of the game during his tenure, has died at the age of 77, the league said on Wednesday. Chris Dignam has more.
